education.dates: Sep. 2019 - Sep. 2022 (3 Years) Degree completion one year ahead of schedule (Bac+4)
coursework: Strong foundation in financial reporting and accounting standards. Completed University Program in Value Investing and AFI Business School's Valuation Analysis program. Expert in financial statement analysis, reporting standards (IFRS/GAAP), and investor communications.

personal.name: Alejandro Moral Aranda
personal.about: Experienced fund reporting analyst with 3+ years specializing in Private Equity, Private Debt, and Real Estate fund reporting. Expert in automated investor reporting systems, NAV analysis, capital activity reporting, and investor communications. Proven track record developing VBA-based automation tools that reduced monthly reporting cycles by 50% and improved data accuracy by 95%. Proficient in Python for document automation (DAS software), SQL for data extraction and validation, and advanced Excel/VBA for complex financial reporting. Skilled in preparing investor statements, CAS reports, performance analytics, and regulatory filings. Strong background in data analytics, process optimization, and cross-functional collaboration with fund administrators, auditors, and investors.

workExperience.title: PERE Fund Accountant & Transfer Agency
workExperience.description: Investor reporting and communications for Private Equity and Real Estate Funds. Prepared monthly/quarterly investor statements, NAV reports, and performance analytics. Managed communications with investors regarding capital activities, distributions, and fund performance. Developed automated reporting systems reducing manual work by 50%.

workExperience.title: Private Debt Fund Accountant
workExperience.description: Investor reporting for Permira Debt Funds. Prepared CAS compliance reports, investor communications, and performance analysis. Coordinated with multiple stakeholders (administrators, auditors, investors) on reporting matters.

workExperience.title: Wealth Management Internship
workExperience.description: Client reporting and communications. Portfolio analysis and performance reporting for clients.

workExperience.title: M&A Analyst Internship
workExperience.description: Analysis reporting and stakeholder communication for acquisition processes.

workExperience.title: Individual Investor
workExperience.description: Portfolio reporting and performance analysis. Investment communications and decision reporting.

projects.title: Polymarket / Polygon Trading Client, Utility Library & Terminal
projects.description: Production-grade Python client for Polymarket/Polygon decentralized prediction markets. Implemented REST + WebSocket utilities, order-book adapters, and advanced order management systems. Developed fast execution terminal supporting remote strategy deployment and automated trading with atomic swap integration.

projects.title: Algorithmic Trading
projects.description: Data-driven trading strategy using machine learning. Implemented Leave-One-Out Cross-Validation and k-Nearest Neighbors with asymptotically optimal weights for predicting market open direction and generating trading signals.

projects.title: Research Papers
projects.description: Collection of peer-reviewed research papers on quantitative finance, econometrics, machine learning, and data science applications in financial markets.

projects.title: VBA Automated Reporting Tools
projects.description: Advanced automation tools in VBA for large-scale report generation and data processing. Automating custom reports using templates with intelligent logic and batch processing capabilities.

projects.title: TareaFlow
projects.description: Web-based team management solution with embedded PowerShell server. Includes task tracking, holiday management, and work-from-home tools running locally without installation.

projects.title: MieMieSocks
projects.description: E-commerce platform mockup for online retail. Built with Bootstrap and Node.js demonstrating full-stack web development capabilities.

projects.title: KanjiList.org
projects.description: Educational web platform for learning Japanese kanji. Utilizes web scraping and Python backend for data collection and interactive learning.
